title: LIHKG registration tutorial (English users come in!)

replies.msg:
Let’s join lihkg



Step 1: go to lihkg.com front page
Step 2: hit the circled icon to reveal the menu
Step 3: hit the person shaped icon, it says login/ register in chinese
Step 4: hit the circled icon, it says member registration
Step4.5: fill in everything as instructed in the photo
Step 5: tick the boxes (both of them! One for capcha one for agreeing to terms) then hit the circled button labelled 5

Then voila! You can read the posts, comment, up and downvote, and download our WhatsApp stickers
